description: Try our easy to follow Orecchiette With Mixed Mushrooms, Garlic & Parsley recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Low sugar,Mushroom
name: Orecchiette With Mixed Mushrooms, Garlic & Parsley Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 rasher streaky bacon, rind removed, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium heat. Add bacon, onion and garlic. Cook for 4 minutes or until onion has softened. Add mushrooms. Cook for 3 minutes or until just tender. Stir in wine. Cook for 2 minutes or until most of the liquid has evaporated. Add cream. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer for 5 minutes or until slightly thickened.

Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large pan of boiling, salted water as per packet instructions. Drain well and add to pan with mushroom sauce. Season to taste. Toss over heat for 2 minutes or until heated through. Serve topped with parsley and parmesan.
